guide.objective: Achieve a line of three of your symbols (X or O) horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the 3x3 grid.
gameRules: The game is played on a 3x3 grid.
Two players take turns to place their symbol (X or O) on an empty cell.
A player's turn consists of placing their symbol on an empty cell.
The game is won by the first player to get three of their symbols in a row. The row can be horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
If the entire grid is filled, and no player has achieved three in a row, the game is a draw.
howToPlay: Click on an empty cell to place your symbol.
The game will automatically switch to the next player's turn.
Pay attention to the grid to spot winning patterns.
tips: Plan ahead to block your opponent and create winning opportunities.
Pay attention to your opponent's moves to anticipate their strategy.
Enjoy the game and have fun!

guide.objective: Achieve a line of five of your symbols (X or O) horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the 8x8 grid.
gameRules: The game is played on an 8x8 grid.
Two players take turns to drop their symbol (X or O) into one of the columns.
Symbols are placed in the lowest available empty slot within the chosen column.
The game is won by the first player to get five of their symbols in a row. The row can be horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
If the entire grid is filled, and no player has achieved five in a row, the game is a draw.
howToPlay: Click on the column where you want to drop your symbol.
The symbol will fall to the lowest available empty slot in the chosen column.
Pay attention to the grid to spot winning patterns.

horizontal: Five in a row from left to right.
vertical: Five in a row from top to bottom.

tips: Plan ahead to block your opponent and create winning opportunities.
Pay attention to the entire grid to anticipate potential winning patterns.
Enjoy the game and have fun!
